title: Murder in the U.S. : number of victims by race/ethnicity and gender 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Races on X-axis for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of victims.
Out of all 4 groups, Total had the highest Number of victims in Race Total and Unknown had the lowest Number of victims in Race Hispanic or Latino.
In Race Total, Male had the highest Number of victims among all 8 Races and it has the lowest Number of victims in Race Unknown race.
The maximum Number of victims for Male that was found in Race Total was 73.25 times larger than the minimum Number of victims observed in Race Unknown race.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Races on X-axis for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of victims.
Out of all 4 groups, Total had the highest Number of victims in Race Total and Unknown had the lowest Number of victims in Race Hispanic or Latino.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Races on X-axis for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of victims.
Out of all 4 groups, Total had the highest Number of victims in Race Total and Unknown had the lowest Number of victims in Race Hispanic or Latino.
Among all the Races, Male had the highest Number of victims 10914.0 in Race Total and lowest value 149.0 in Race Unknown race.
There is a gap of 10765.0 between the highest and lowest Number of victims found for Male in Race Total and Unknown race.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Number of victims was found in case of Total.

In Race Total, Total had the highest Number of victims 14123.0 among the 4 groups and in Hispanic or Latino, Unknown had the lowest Number of victims 0.0. The second highest Number of victims 3180.0 was observed for Total in Race Total.
Averaging all 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown, the Race Total is the maximum Number of victims and Unknown race is the minimum Number of victims.
